readme:
**Overview**  
The "Short Content" automation is a powerful, all-in-one solution designed to streamline the creation of short videos for social media, marketing, or personal projects. Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools and seamless workflows, this automation handles everything from scriptwriting to video assemblyâ€”saving time and effort while delivering professional results.

**Problem**  
Creating short videos manually is time-consuming and expensive. Businesses and creators struggle with:

  * Hiring writers, designers, and editors.
  * Juggling multiple tools for scripts, visuals, and editing.
  * Inconsistent quality and slow turnaround times.



This automation solves these challenges with a fully AI-driven, one-click workflow.

**Tech Stack**  
**ğŸ› ï¸ Core Tools:**

  * LLM (e.g., GPT-4): Auto-generates engaging video scripts.
  * Baserow: Manages workflows, errors, and data tracking.
  * Leonardo AI: Creates stunning visuals from scripts.
  * RunwayML/HeyGen: Converts images to videos (acting scenes or UGC).
  * JSON2Video: Assembles final videos with captions/effects.



**ğŸ”Œ Integration:**

N8N Automation: Pre-built JSON workflows connect all tools seamlessly.

**Solution**  
A no-code, end-to-end automation that:

  1. Writes scripts using AI (LLM) Or Manual Scripting.

  2. Generates visuals (Leonardo AI) or acting scenes (RunwayML).

  3. Edits & assembles videos (JSON2Video/HeyGen).

  4. Tracks progress in Baserow (errors, revisions, analytics).




âœ… Result: High-quality short videos in minutes, not daysâ€”with zero manual effort.

**How It Works**

  1. Start with a Pre-Built Form  
Fill in the Baserow form (included) with your video requirements.

  2. Generate Videos Instantly  
Single Video Mode:



  * Run one video at a time for quick projects.

  * Bulk Mode: Upload a CSV or use Baserow to queue unlimited videosâ€”ideal for scaling content.



  1. Workflow Handles the Rest

  2. Manage & Iterate  
Track all videos in Baserow: Edit inputs, retry failed jobs, or adjust styles anytime.




**Setup Steps**  
Upload Blueprint to N8N:

  * Import the provided JSON workflow into your N8N instance.



Create Credentials for Tools:

  * OpenAI: Add API key for script generation.
  * Leonardo AI: Connect via API for image creation.
  * RunwayML: Link account for video animation.
  * Baserow: Set up database and API for workflow tracking.
  * HeyGen/Caption AI: Configure for UGC-style videos.



Configure Workflow Triggers:

  * Set input triggers (e.g., Baserow form, manual entry) to start automation.



Test & Deploy:

  * Run a test workflow to ensure all tools are connected.
  * Adjust parameters (e.g., video length, style) in Baserow/N8N.



Automate:

  * Activate the workflowâ€”scripts, visuals, and videos generate automatically!



**Whatâ€™s Included**

  * Baserow Template: Pre-configured database.
  * N8N JSON Blueprint: Ready-to-use workflow.
  * Setup Video: Step-by-step guide.

Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools and seamless workflows, this automation handles everything from scriptwriting to video assemblyâ€”saving time and effort while delivering professional results.

Problem
Creating short videos manually is time-consuming and expensive. Businesses and creators struggle with:

  • Hiring writers, designers, and editors.
  • Juggling multiple tools for scripts, visuals, and editing.
  • Inconsistent quality and slow turnaround times.

This automation solves these challenges with a fully AI-driven, one-click workflow.

Tech Stack
ğŸ› ï¸ Core Tools:

  • LLM (e.g., GPT-4): Auto-generates engaging video scripts.
  • Baserow: Manages workflows, errors, and data tracking.
  • Leonardo AI: Creates stunning visuals from scripts.
  • RunwayML/HeyGen: Converts images to videos (acting scenes or UGC).
  • JSON2Video: Assembles final videos with captions/effects.

ğŸ”Œ Integration:

N8N Automation: Pre-built JSON workflows connect all tools seamlessly.

Solution
A no-code, end-to-end automation that:

  1. Writes scripts using AI (LLM) Or Manual Scripting.

  2. Generates visuals (Leonardo AI) or acting scenes (RunwayML).

  3. Edits & assembles videos (JSON2Video/HeyGen).

  4. Tracks progress in Baserow (errors, revisions, analytics).

âœ… Result: High-quality short videos in minutes, not daysâ€”with zero manual effort.

How It Works

  1. Start with a Pre-Built Form
    Fill in the Baserow form (included) with your video requirements.

  2. Generate Videos Instantly
    Single Video Mode:

  • Run one video at a time for quick projects.

  • Bulk Mode: Upload a CSV or use Baserow to queue unlimited videosâ€”ideal for scaling content.

  1. Workflow Handles the Rest

  2. Manage & Iterate
    Track all videos in Baserow: Edit inputs, retry failed jobs, or adjust styles anytime.

Setup Steps
Upload Blueprint to N8N:

  • Import the provided JSON workflow into your N8N instance.

Create Credentials for Tools:

  • OpenAI: Add API key for script generation.
  • Leonardo AI: Connect via API for image creation.
  • RunwayML: Link account for video animation.
  • Baserow: Set up database and API for workflow tracking.
  • HeyGen/Caption AI: Configure for UGC-style videos.

Configure Workflow Triggers:

  • Set input triggers (e.g., Baserow form, manual entry) to start automation.

Test & Deploy:

  • Run a test workflow to ensure all tools are connected.
  • Adjust parameters (e.g., video length, style) in Baserow/N8N.

Automate:

  • Activate the workflowâ€”scripts, visuals, and videos generate automatically!

Whatâ€™s Included

  • Baserow Template: Pre-configured database.
  • N8N JSON Blueprint: Ready-to-use workflow.
  • Setup Video: Step-by-step guide.
